ai-mil3.3.12:1.1_0: “Reverend Sir, what is the characteristic of consciousness?”
ai-mil3.3.12:2.2_0: “Just as, great king, when he’s come in the middle of the city, he’d see a man coming in the middle of the city.
ai-mil3.3.12:2.3_0: In the same way, a person sees a sight with their eyes.
ai-mil3.3.12:2.4_0: He hears a sound with the ear ...
ai-mil3.3.12:2.5_0: What you smell an odor with the nose, and you cognize it.
ai-mil3.3.12:2.6_0: Whatever flavor you taste, it cognizes with the tongue, and tastes it with consciousness.
ai-mil3.3.12:2.7_0: They directly know touches, and thoughts known by the mind.
ai-mil3.3.12:4.1_0: The Characteristics of consciousness is the twelfth,
